description:
Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Tired of boring workouts? MarkRun transforms your fitness routine by blending exercise with eco-friendly missions—adding fun and encouragement into every move!


Missing motivation or any extras to keep going?MarkRun makes workouts engaging and sustained through ongoing incentives!
WORKOUT COURSES: Follow structured workout routines and collect Fragments as a bonus after each session.
RUNNING MISSIONS: Jog while completing eco-tasks like picking up litter or petting a kitten—gather Fragments as you go!
FRAGMENT COLLECTION: Accumulate fragments, unlock collectible cards, and keep your motivation high.
TOTAL PRIVACY: The information you provide will only be used for sports data calculation and service optimization. We will store it in compliance with the law and strictly protect your privacy and will not use it for unauthorized purposes.

We hope our app can make become a better and healthier you:
Suggestions for questions:  feedback@mark-run.com
User Agreement: https://resource.mark-run.com/MarkRun/statement.html 
Privacy Agreement: https://resource.mark-run.com/MarkRun/privacy.html

Download MarkRun now and join the movement—get healthy, collect fragments, and support the planet!

Join the world’s largest walking community!
StepsApp turns your iPhone into a sleek, powerful step counter — no extra devices needed. 

Just slip your phone into your pocket and get moving.
Set goals. Count steps. Burn calories.

STEPSAPP INCLUDES

• Automatic step counting
• Stunning charts and animations
• NEW: Workouts with Map Tracking, Heart Rate Zones and Insights.
• Apple Health integration
• Apple Watch support
• Workouts with GPS tracking
• Active calories
• Insights
• Trends. Totals. Records.
• Powerful day, week, and month views
• Awards with 3D medals
• iOS 14 widgets for your home screen
• Dark and Light Mode
• Six beautiful colors – also change the app icon
• iMessage app
• Today widget
• More Daily goals & Notifications
• Social media sharing
• Wheelchair support
• Export data
• No extra hardware required

YOUR ACTIVITY AT A GLANCE

• Quick overview of your daily steps, distance, time, floors climbed, and active calories.
• Beautiful weekly, monthly, and yearly charts.
• See your progress directly in the today widget.
• Display your current step count or wheelchair pushes on the app icon.
• Notifications when you have reached your daily activity goal.
• Weekly Report
• Set and reach your goal… step by step.

APPLE WATCH & APPLE HEALTH

• Synchronize and import your activity data via Apple Health.
• Track your activity with your iPhone and your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp will merge your steps automatically.
• Now with Apple Watch workouts with GPS tracking.
• Securely store your actively burned calories in Apple Health.

STEPSAPP FOR EVERYONE

• Also enjoy StepsApp with VoiceOver.
• Instead of steps, track wheelchair pushes with your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp supports more than 20 languages.

CUSTOMIZE & SHARE

• Spice up your charts with six beautiful colors.
• Also change the App Icon
• Share your achievements on social media directly from  StepsApp...
• …or with our brand new iMessage app!

Your activity tracker to form a habit of walking, running, hiking 
and weight loss.

StepsApp Privacy Policy:
https://steps.app/privacy

* StepsApp requires iPhone 5s or newer

Are you sure that the "miracle" cream you slather on your body every day is safe for your skin? Do you really know what ingredients your favorite foundation contains? The OnSkin app will set your mind at ease by telling you precisely what you’re putting on your skin and whether it's safe for you.

COSMETIC SAFETY SCANNER
With OnSkin, you have a seasoned digital cosmetologist by your side. Choose from three ways to get a product’s safety profile—take a photo of it, scan its barcode, or look up its name on the app. OnSkin will see past the glitz and glamor and decipher the Latin names on the label in a clear way, flagging any potentially harmful components. Plus, the app recommends cleaner alternatives to help you look and feel healthier inside and out.

SCIENCE IS OUR INFLUENCER
The OnSkin product ratings are 100% unbiased—we don’t partner with any brands. Our in-house team of biologists and physicians have used the latest scientific research on toxicology and dermatology to assess over 15,000 cosmetic ingredients. Using an AI calculating algorithm and human curation, we rate products promptly while preserving the quality of manual analysis.

PERSONALIZED SKINCARE TIPS
Just complete a short survey about your skin to get essential care steps and active ingredients to look for when hunting for new products, all tuned to your unique skin and curated by our skin experts. These may be a great kickoff for starting a substantial skincare routine or double-checking your existing one.

SKIN MATCH
Finding suitable products for your skin (especially if it’s acne-prone and sensitive) can be quite a puzzle, but with OnSkin, you’ll always know if a product is a perfect match, a potential match, or not a match for you. Based on the info you input about your skin type and skincare goals, we check how well a product is tailored to your skin needs, so you can invest in effective formulas without having to experiment with your face.

PRODUCT REVIEWS
Viral products seem tempting to give a shot, but how do you check whether it's all just hype before you rush to Sephora? Every week, you’ll see compilations of the top 10 most buzzy products from various categories, from washes to serums. For each, you’ll learn about the powerful and questionable ingredients and their effects, all explained in simple terms. Plus, our skin experts will weigh in on whether it's good value for money! You get to see the real face of raved-about skincare and pick items based on their effects, not just their popularity.

POPULAR SCANS
See what products are trending on the app and discover new faves!

GUESS THE SCORE
Test your cosmetic intuition with this quick, fun daily game. Is a product’s safety score above or below 50? Pick it right and get a chance to win Premium and scan products without limits!

AI SKIN HELPER 
Need specific advice on your skin type or want to learn more about that latest beauty trend? Type in your own query or choose from the most popular ones and get a professional consultation from the AI Skin Helper in a matter of seconds. 

HAIR LAB
With Hair Lab, you quickly get a cosmetologist-approved analysis of any hair product and see if its components are likely to suit your hair needs. Use Hair Lab to build your locks’ dream routine and enjoy having a good hair day every day!

ON-DEMAND ANALYSIS OF BEAUTY PRODUCTS
If you want to check a product that's not yet on OnSkin, add it to our database—you'll see its safety score in just a few hours. 

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to get unlimited access to certain app features.
• Subscriptions are billed automatically at the rate depending on the selected subscription plan.

By using the app, you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy and Terms
https://aiby.mobi/cosmetic/terms 
https://aiby.mobi/cosmetic/privacy

Looking to make reaching your weight goals easier and faster? Welcome to the Calorie Counter & Food Tracker app – your go-to tool for smarter eating and a healthier lifestyle.


With our revolutionary AI Food Scanner, you can now snap a photo of your meal and instantly get detailed nutritional information, making calorie tracking faster and more accurate than ever before. Say goodbye to searching for individual food items—just take a picture, and the app does the rest.


Weight management sounds simple: consume fewer calories than you burn to lose weight, and more to gain. But balancing these factors can be challenging. Our AI-powered food recognition technology takes the guesswork out of calorie tracking, so you can focus on your goals with ease. We created this app to be your supportive companion in reaching your weight management goals, making the process simpler and more efficient.


Our principle: It's always better to log calories and macros, even if it's not perfect, than not to log at all. Easier and faster logging reduces the temptation to skip it, and consistency is key to transforming your body.


Key features for sustainable weight loss, muscle gain, or maintenance:


SMART AI FOOD RECOGNITION

Our new AI Food Scanner allows you to snap a photo of your meal and instantly get nutritional information. No more searching for individual food items—just take a picture, and the app does the rest. Whether spoken, typed, or photographed, logging is effortless.   


BARCODE SCANNER

For packaged foods, our quick, accurate, and hassle-free barcode scanner ensures seamless tracking.


SOLID SCIENTIFIC BASE

We use scientific precision for calorie calculation, integrating insights from sports science. Our calculators utilize the Cunningham equation for Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE), considering body weight, fat percentage, and activity level to provide a personalized and accurate calorie budget.


PRECISE CALORIE & MACRO CALCULATOR

Take a quick quiz on your body and fitness level, and our app creates a personalized plan. Whether you want to lose fat, gain muscle, or maintain your weight, the app tailors a diet plan for you.


FLEXIBLE APPROACH

We follow the latest guidelines for sustainable fat loss or muscle gain, letting you choose a comfortable pace based on your goals and calorie budget.


MACRO TRACKER

We don't just track calories; we provide a personalized macro plan, starting with protein recommendations based on your activity level and body parameters. We also customize your carb and fat intake based on your preferred diet—whether balanced, low-carb, low-fat, or keto.


WATER TRACKER

Hydration is crucial. Our Water Tracker helps you monitor your daily water intake to ensure you're drinking enough throughout the day. Log your water and the app tracks your progress.


WEIGHT TRACKER

Our Weight Tracker helps you monitor weight changes over time. Track your weight regularly and see your progress with detailed insights. Whether you're losing weight, gaining muscle, or maintaining, this feature gives you a clear view of your progress.


DAILY DASHBOARD

View your calorie and macro budget each day, helping you choose meals that align with your goals. Customize your approach to find the best balance for your lifestyle.


Transform your relationship with food and fitness with the Calorie Counter & Food Tracker app.


Download now to make achieving your weight goals a reality!


- Terms of Use: https://wellness.municorn.com/terms?app=calorie-counter

- Privacy Policy: https://wellness.municorn.com/privacy?app=calorie-counter

- CCPA: https://wellness.municorn.com/ccpa?app=calorie-counter

- Privacy Supplement: https://wellness.municorn.com/privacy-supplement?app=calorie-counter


For any questions or inquiries, please contact us at cc-support@municorn.com

Hey, welcome the Gentler Streak - the app that keeps your active life alive! An award-winning health and fitness tracker offers personalized guidance that adapts to your daily capabilities and not the other way around. For those of us who want to move consistently, not constantly.

Built with care by a small indie team.

• 2024 Apple Design Award - Social Impact | 2022 Apple Watch App of the Year | App of the Day | Editor’s Choice
• Featured in The Verge, Forbes, TechCrunch, and more.

▶UNDERSTAND YOUR DAILY READINESS◀
[KEY HEALTH METRICS]
Start your day with a summary of key vitals and sleep, helping you detect changes before you feel them. Receive workout suggestions that respond to your readiness. Set home screen widgets to bring this info closer to you.

[FULL SLEEP ANALYSIS]
See everything from sleep onset to how much restorative sleep you are getting. View trends over 14 nights in sleep duration, consistency, and stages to spot patterns and improve your sleep hygiene.

[NEW - DAILY STEPS, DONE DIFFERENTLY]
You can now track daily steps, distance, walking time, flights climbed, and walking heart rate—all with a 14-day trend overview.
Our approach doesn’t push you to chase step goals. Instead, it helps you understand your daily movement patterns—ideal for everyday walkers and those managing chronic conditions.

[SYNC ACTIVITIES WITH YOUR CYCLE]
Know daily stress tolerance of each menstrual cycle phase and receive support for your current state, with workout suggestions like "Flow Workouts" along with allowing you to take a pause when your period starts.

▶STAYING ACTIVE ON YOUR TERMS◀
[STREAK & STATUS]
Keep your streak alive by following your body’s needs, even when it calls for rest days. When life happens—be it illness, injury, or vacation—adjust your status to reflect real life and skip feeling guilty.

[AWARD-WINNING APPLE WATCH WORKOUT TRACKER]
Track real-time training effects and heart rate zones to manage your workout intensity and avoid overtraining. Get a countdown to “overreaching” to know exactly when you're close to pushing too hard for the day.

[PERSONALIZED WORKOUT TRACKING]
Track 140+ activities, from chores to a variety of workouts, with detailed maps and metric charts, and stay within your healthy activity levels.

[TAILORED DAILY WORKOUTS]
Get daily suggestions—ranging from rest to high-intensity exercises—based on your readiness. Go Gentler's on-watch suggestions allow you to scale your exercise duration and/or intensity up or down.

▶ULTIMATE WORKOUT JOURNAL◀
[PERSONALIZED SUMMARIES]
Turn your workout summaries into a personalized fitness journal. Customize them with details that matter to you: rename workouts, add notes, photos, and mark your favorite sessions. Plus, adjust the effort using the RPE chart when needed.

[PROGRESS CHARTS]
Your progress with weekly, monthly and yearly charts, including a monthly and yearly recap.

[LIVE ACTIVITY & WIDGETS]
Use Live Activity for tracking on iPhone, and interactive widgets on your Home & Lock screens.

[ACCESSIBLE TO ALL]
Full support for accessibility preferences including bold text, dynamic type, reduced transparency, increased contrast, motion adjustments, and voiceover.

[PRIVATE DATA STAYS PRIVATE]
Your health data stays on-device via Apple HealthKit, with no external processing.

Upgrade to Gentler Streak Premium with monthly, yearly, or lifetime plans for advanced features and family sharing.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage plans and turn off auto-renewal in Settings > Apple ID >  Subscriptions.

Please note, Gentler Streak is not a medical device and should not replace professional medical advice.

Terms of service: https://gentler.app/terms/
Privacy policy: https://gentler.app/privacy

Momiary: Pregnancy Tracker & Health Guide for Moms-to-Be
Take charge of your pregnancy journey with Momiary — a comprehensive app designed to support expecting moms with smart tracking tools, health insights, and expert-backed advice for every week of your pregnancy.

Whether you're planning, expecting, or already navigating symptoms, Momiary is your private, powerful companion.

Top Features of Momiary: Pregnancy & Period Tracker

1. Period & Ovulation Tracking

Stay in tune with your cycle: track periods, predict ovulation, and identify your fertile days.
View cycle patterns and get reminders tailored to hormonal changes.
Built-in ovulation calculator for accurate fertility prediction.
2. Pregnancy Health Monitoring

Log daily weight and symptoms like nausea, fatigue, or cravings.
Visualize your health trends with charts and analytics.
Receive daily advice based on your pregnancy stage and symptoms.
3. Week-by-Week Pregnancy Guide

Know what’s happening each week with a breakdown of baby’s development.
Fun comparisons like “baby’s size as a fruit” to track growth.
Countdown to your due date and access regular check-up tips.
4. Maternal Wellness & Lifestyle Tools

Get curated nutrition tips and mental wellness guidance.
Kegel exercise reminders to support pelvic health.
Browse name ideas and prepare for baby without stress.
Why Moms Love Momiary

Privacy-First Design: Your data stays on your device. No tracking, no third-party access.
Medical-Grade Content: Built on trusted health recommendations for moms and moms-to-be.
User-Focused: No overwhelming baby features – just smart tools for your well-being.
From irregular cycles to postpartum prep, Momiary helps you stay informed, healthy, and confident every step of the way.

Our Commitment to Data Privacy

Momiary does not collect or store your personal health data. Everything stays on your phone. Your journey, your data — always private.

Download Momiary Today
Start your pregnancy journey with support, clarity, and confidence. All-in-one care, made just for you.

Privacy URL: https://chuongmatrix.netlify.app/privacy.html
Term of Use: https://chuongmatrix.netlify.app/eula

Track your baby's sleep, feeding, diaper changes, pumping, and mood.

Now you have an assistant on your journey to mindful parenting – trusted by 1,000,000+ moms and dads! Grow Together. Every Step of the Way.

GROWTH CRISES CALENDAR
From birth up to 2 years, a child goes through several growth and development crises. There's no need to be worried – this is a natural process during which the nervous system and brain develop, and the baby acquires new skills. However, during such periods, a child might become fussy and sleep poorly.

We display growth crises in the calendar so you won't worry: together with pediatricians we explain what's happening with the physiology, motor skills, and speech development of your child up to 105 weeks inclusive.

MEASUREMENTS OF HEIGHT, WEIGHT, AND CIRCUMFERENCES
Fix key child's growth parameters – and track how they change. Check them with the World Health Organization's standards. 

TRACKERS FOR SLEEP, FEEDING, DIAPER CHANGES, PUMPING, AND CHILD'S MOOD
Record all the important information about your child's daily schedule and routine – all in one app.

230+ DEVELOPMENTAL EXERCISES FOR EVERY DAY
Tiger on a Branch, Maracas, More Noise, Miracles – these are not the titles of colorful children's cartoons, but engaging developmental exercises that you can perform with your child every day.

JOURNAL OF PRECIOUS MOMENTS
The first smile of your little one, the first tooth, the momentous first step – keep lovely memories not just in your heart. Record them in the app to create a cute video and share it on social media and messengers with family and friends. 

SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION

The subscription provides access to additional services in the app, becoming your daily go-to parenting resource.

- A set of exercises for each day. They match the stage of your baby's development and don't take much time. The checklist format makes it easy to keep track of completed exercises.
- Developmental norms: cognitive and psychological, speech and motor skills, teething. Checked by pediatricians and approved by the World Health Organization.

Additional information:

- Payment will be charged to your Apple account after purchase confirmation. You could check the available subscription options in the app after its installation.
- The subscription automatically renews. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, if auto-renewal has not been turned off.
- You can easily manage subscriptions in your Apple account settings – for example, turn off automatic subscription renewal right after purchase.

More details: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

FROM THE APP'S CREATOR 

Hello! My name is Dima, I am the father of a wonderful girl, Elli. 

When she was born, my whole world turned upside down. I learned about growth crises challenging for both the child and parents. To keep track of them, I created this app. Suddenly other parents started using it too. Today, thousands of moms and dads monitor their child's development with us – it's so inspiring, I'm so grateful. Thank you!


Growing up is not easy! But we support parents and children every day on this exciting journey.

Privacy Policy: https://sprouty.app/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://sprouty.app/terms-of-service

Form one-to-one connections with personal trainers, dietitians, and medical professionals, while tracking your nutritional and fitness goals with North Star. While you can find these professionals through the app, you can also consult them and have training sessions via the North Star App.

North Star is an app that helps you with total wellness of your life with features focused on Fitness, Nutrition, and Medical Assistance.

Download our Fitness and Health app and start your free trial of 14 days to gain access to the pro features of the North Star app. That includes a calorie counter, macro counter, workout planner, exercise bank, resource library, etc.

Because of our virtual consultation and online training sessions, you can train and get these services from home or anywhere convenient.

North Star has a network of Fitness and Health professionals in multiple countries. Hence you don't have to limit yourself to finding a trainer or a dietitian in your local area. And you can check their reviews before selecting them to help you with your fitness journey.

Download the North Star App to get access to all of these features.

- Find Personal Trainers, Dietitians, Doctors & Physiotherapists - Check their location, qualifications, and reviews to see whether they match your requirements.
- Virtual Consultation - Consult your dietitian or doctor online through the app.
- Live Video Training - Train from home or anywhere convenient with the live guidance of your trainer.
- Track your calories - Log your meals with the built-in food bank or enter the ingredients to log your calorie intake.
- Track your workouts - Log your workouts and track your calorie burn.
- Track your medical reports - Log your medical reports so your medical professional can use that data for virtual consultation.
- Track your family's health records - Keep a track of your family's health through the family link feature.
- Access to the Exercise Bank - Thousands of exercises are available in the bank with animations and information about each exercise.
- Access to the Resource Library - Get more information on fitness-related health conditions and injuries and access North Star Newsletters that help your wellness journey.
- Integrate your fitness devices - Transfer your health data to the North Star app to help professionals understand your conditions better.

Experience personalized fitness and health services with the North Star app. Find what's relevant for you and work for it with professional guidance.

View our terms & conditions and privacy policy:

Join over 10 million women and seniors around the world who’ve chosen LazyFit to stay active, healthy, and confident.
No pressure. No gym required. Just simple, science-based workouts you can do anytime — right from your chair, bed, or living room.

- LAZYFIT FEATURES
28-Day Weight-Loss Challenge
Kickstart your transformation with short daily sessions that gradually build up intensity. Designed to help you burn calories and tone muscles while staying gentle on joints.

Chair Yoga
Stretch, strengthen, and restore — all from the comfort of your chair. Perfect for beginners or anyone with limited mobility, Chair Yoga helps you improve flexibility, posture, and balance without strain.

Pilates for Every Place
• Bed Pilates — Strengthen and stretch without leaving your bed; perfect for morning or bedtime routines.
• Mat Pilates — Classic floor routines to tone your core and improve posture, guided with easy-to-follow cues.
• Wall Pilates — Build balance and strength using wall support; ideal for beginners or joint-friendly training.
Each routine tones your core, eases tension, and improves balance — perfect for building strength at any age or fitness level.

Tai Chi Flow
Breathe deeply, calm your mind, and strengthen your body through graceful, flowing movements inspired by traditional Tai Chi.

Guided Walking Workouts
Turn every walk — indoors or outdoors — into a mindful fitness session. Follow calming audio guidance, track your steps and calories.

- Why You’ll Love LazyFit
• Low-impact & beginner-friendly — suitable for all ages and body types.
• Clear video guidance — follow step-by-step demonstrations with easy pacing.
• Smart progress tracking — see your improvements in strength, endurance, and balance.
• Personalized daily plan — LazyFit adapts to your energy, mood, and goals.
• Gentle reminders — stay motivated without pressure. Move Gently, Live Fully

- Start Feeling Better Today
Whether you’re returning to exercise, staying active from home, or caring for your body as it changes, LazyFit adapts to your rhythm.
Short on time? Choose 10-minute routines.
Need a break from screens? Follow calming audio guidance and focus on breathing.
Open LazyFit. Move your way — one gentle step at a time.

THE ULTIMATE AI-DRIVEN WORKOUT APP FOR FASTER, SMARTER RESULTS
Muscle Monster Workout Planner is an efficient, scientific, and personalized fitness and wellness application. It can be used as your pocket personal fitness trainer to tailor a training plan for you, whether it is fat loss, muscle gain, body shaping, maintaining health, improving immunity, and improving physical and mental health and happiness. You only need to download the app, follow the daily training requirements and detailed analysis, and you can learn the power points in fitness and the anatomy of fitness muscles. Whether you are training in the gym or at home, whether it is weightlifting training or dumbbell, kettlebell training, or bodyweight training and calisthenics, Muscle Monster Workout Planner can meet your fitness needs and maximize your fitness efficiency.

TONS OF FITNESS PLANS AND WORKOUTS
With over 1200 fitness movements and detailed explanations, more than 500 workouts, and unlimited smart fitness plans tailored to individual training preferences, including weightlifting routines, fitness warm-up and stretching plans, core strength training programs, 21-day fitness plans, and weekly 7-minute workout plans. COMPREHENSIVE COVERAGE OF VARIOUS FITNESS EQUIPMENT TYPES
Muscle Monster offers a variety of equipment-guided workouts, including both equipment-based and bodyweight exercises, to help you efficiently achieve your goals of fat loss, muscle gain, and toning. From calisthenics and bodyweight training to dumbbells, kettlebells, barbells, resistance bands, and gym equipment like power racks and cable machines, Muscle Monster provides scientifically effective fitness plans tailored to the equipment you use.

EXERCISE DATA TRACKING

Your workout duration, calories burned, and weights lifted are all logged and used to generate training reports for you. Detailed reports are available for your weekly and monthly workouts. APPLE HEALTH INTEGRATION AND APPLE WATCH
Supporting integration with Apple Health for comprehensive activity tracking, witnessing every step of your healthy lifestyle progress. If you own an Apple Watch, you can use the watch version simultaneously to monitor your performance in real-time, refining personalized recommendations within the app. As you continue to use Muscle Monster during your workouts, it will progressively understand your training foundation and preferences to design the most suitable fitness plan for you.
